author: dkotlins
body:
Update PixelCPE (SiPixelRecHits) to handle the new generic error container (GenError).
Also modifies 1 file in RecoLocalTracker/Records in order to pass the new DB object to 
the CPE producers.
Should be made on top of pull request #3261.
title: Update PixelCPE (SiPixelRecHits) to handle the new generic error container (GenError).
